title: Polyester
creator_credit: Van Smith, John Waters and New Line Cinema
headline_credit: United States and United States of America, 1981
brief_description: A comedy melodrama of the tragic life of Francine Fishpaw (Divine), an obese housewife whose mere existence burdens her so-called loved ones. Mistreated by her husband Elmer, who runs the local porn theatre and money-hungry mother, La Rue, she turns to the bottle.

constellations_other.name: Supplementing cinema
constellations_other.description: A celebration of b-grade cinema's never-ending quest for more, more, more.

creator_credit_for_label: Van Smith, John Waters and New Line Cinema
headline_credit_for_label: United States and United States of America, 1981
description: A suburban housewife’s world falls apart when her pornographer husband admits he’s serially unfaithful to her, her daughter gets pregnant, and her son is suspected of being the foot-fetishist who’s been breaking local women’s feet.
